subject: Re: [junit] OO testing methodology
msgSnippet: ... Why are you looking for a methodology? I have had much more success by simply looking at the problems and searching for concrete techniques and the
messageBody:
Maly, Daniel wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> This may not be the best user group for my post, but I believe the unit
> testing experts will have an answer:
>
> I'm looking for a formal testing methodology/process to accompany and
> precede our unit testing harness - on the development side of SDLC. An
> approach that unifies requirements testing, software design testing and
> implementation testing.
>
> Any information is very appreciated.

Why are you looking for a methodology? I have had much more success by
simply looking at the problems and searching for concrete techniques and
the supporting principles that solve those problems and stop them from
recurring.

What problems are you trying to solve?
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
